testimonials.name: Sarah & Michael
testimonials.text: The 10-hour package was absolutely perfect! Violeta captured everything from our getting ready moments to the last dance. The dual-camera coverage meant we didn't miss a single emotion. We're so grateful we chose the extended coverage - it was worth every penny.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The ultimate luxury package exceeded all expectations. Having two videographers and the drone footage created this incredible cinematic experience. The feature film is absolutely breathtaking - we watch it on every anniversary. This is an heirloom piece we'll treasure forever.

testimonials.name: James & Patricia
testimonials.text: We had a small intimate ceremony and the 4-hour package was perfect for us. Violeta captured all the important moments without being intrusive. The highlight film brings tears to our eyes every time. Highly recommend for elopements!

testimonials.name: Alexandra Chen
testimonials.text: The 8-hour coverage gave us exactly what we needed. From getting ready through the reception, every special moment was beautifully captured. The feature film tells our story perfectly. Our families were blown away by the quality and emotion.

workflow.title: Initial Consultation
workflow.description: We'll meet to discuss your vision, cinematic style preferences, and wedding day timeline. This is where we get to know each other and ensure we're the perfect creative fit.

workflow.title: Contract & Deposit
workflow.description: Once we've agreed on the package and details, you'll sign the contract and pay a 30% deposit to secure your date on our calendar.

workflow.title: Engagement Session
workflow.description: If included in your package, we'll schedule your engagement film session. This helps us build rapport, understand your chemistry, and get comfortable working together.

workflow.title: Pre-Wedding Planning
workflow.description: About a month before your wedding, we'll finalize the timeline, shot list, music preferences, and any special requests. Final payment is due two weeks before the wedding.

workflow.title: Your Wedding Day
workflow.description: We'll arrive early to capture all the cinematic moments from getting ready through the reception. Just relax, be present, and enjoy your day - we've got you covered!

workflow.title: Film Delivery
workflow.description: Your edited films will be delivered via a premium online gallery where you can view, download, and share. Physical USBs will arrive separately in beautiful presentation packaging.
